item.title: Songs
item.description: Eurielle - Song of Durin – Hobbit Part 1-3 Jade Bird - Ruins

item.title: Musical Thoughts
item.description: Don’t we feel a curiosity why music has played such an important part of our life? Even though we dont like a certain language, we love to hear the mere music without understanding what it’s talking about, isn’t it? I clearly listened to Shakira’s Chantaje without even searching for what it means or what it is talking about. Music has no clear origins from where it all started. Regarding to it’s origin there are basically two theories that are worth to be watched: Evolutionary basis or The Cultural Evolution
